attributes.action: Close schools for Autumn & Winter to prevent swine flu from spreading even quicker, especially as it is dangerous particularly for children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With an estimated 65,000 deaths expected from Swine Flu in the UK, and children being amongst one of the most likely groups to be both widespread and for it to be more dangerous for, schools should be closed during Autumn and Winter which are the peak flu times at the best of times and this would help to prevent the vast and rapid spread of the disease.
